heading: HR00673
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO CHARGES COLLECTED BY CABLE AND SATELLITE TELEVISION COMPANIES FROM ITS SUBSCRIBERS DESPITE THE EXPIRATION OF SOLAR ENTERTAINMENT'S CONTRACT TO SELL NBA PROGRAMMING TO CABLE AND SATELLITE TELEVISION PROVIDERS IN THE PHILIPPINES
status: Pending with the Committee on TRADE AND INDUSTRY since 2020-02-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00673
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO CHARGES COLLECTED BY CABLE AND SATELLITE TELEVISION COMPANIES FROM ITS SUBSCRIBERS DESPITE THE EXPIRATION OF SOLAR ENTERTAINMENT'S CONTRACT TO SELL NBA PROGRAMMING TO CABLE AND SATELLITE TELEVISION PROVIDERS IN THE PHILIPPINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
DATE FILED : 2020-01-28
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY ON 2020-02-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2020-02-04;
